CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |
| ITO |
| ZnO |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |
| MoO3 |

The following entities were removed:

* ITO (not a material name, but rather a component of the device structure)
* ZnO (not a material name, but rather a component of the device structure)
* Al (not a material name, but rather a component of the device structure)
